articles.title: Lioness dies in tragic fall at zoo just 2 weeks after mate is euthanized
articles.description: The Chicago Zoological Society has had to euthanize its female African lion at the Brookfield Zoo after she suffered injuries from an accidental fall.
articles.content:
The Chicago Zoological Society has had to euthanize its female African lion at the Brookfield Zoo after she suffered injuries from an accidental fall just two weeks after euthanizing its male African lion due to age related complications.

articles.title: Asian shares decline on revived jitters over trade deal
articles.description: Asian shares have retreated as conflicting reports raised concerns over the likely outcome of a trade deal to be signed by the U.S. and China
articles.content:
BANGKOK -- 
Shares retreated in Asia on Wednesday as conflicting reports raised concerns over the likely outcome of a trade deal to be signed by the U.S. and China.
